title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research, gather user feedback, and analyze existing data visualization tools to identify key features and functionalities.

title: Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, and database components. Define the data models, APIs, integration points, and communication protocols. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and interactive visualizations using modern web technologies. Implement responsive design and ensure cross-browser compatibility.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the server-side logic, APIs, and data processing pipelines. Integrate with databases and external data sources.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store and manage large datasets efficiently. Optimize for performance and scalability.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and test cases for functional, performance, and security testing. Implement continuous integration and automated testing pipelines.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, including continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, monitoring, and scaling strategies.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, administrators, and end-users. Develop user guides, tutorials, and support resources.
